title: Can you ranked queue with two or more yet?
body: I read in the patch notes for the new season that you will be able to queue with more than one other person. Has that been implemented yet or will that not be released until the season launch? Thanks!

replies.body:
You can always que with 2 people.

The update to allow you to que with 3-4 people wont be coming until January most likely. Probably with Patch 6.1.
it will allow 5 people as well, and it will most likely not be 6.1, but still during pre-season.
I read that the "beta" for the new Client is in early January, with the changes not going to everyone until patch 6.1.

I'm really not looking forward to this. I think there will be a lot more boosters, more bullying (premade 4 against 1 random) and unfair advantage when placed against premades of 5 who have communication advantage as well as knowing their play styles.
